meanings.sent1: Turning off the light bedarkens the room.
meanings.sent2: The storm clouds bedarken the sky.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick bedarkens the stage suddenly.
meanings.sent4: The news of the accident bedarkens our mood.
meanings.sent5: The shadow of the tree bedarkens the grass beneath it.

meanings.sent1: As the sun sets, the room slowly bedarkens.
meanings.sent2: The sky bedarkens as night falls.
meanings.sent3: The movie theater bedarkens as the film begins.
meanings.sent4: The future seems to bedarken with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds bedarken the once bright sky.
